import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { DepartmentClient } from 'src/app/api/app.generated'; @Component({ selector: 'app-department-add', templateUrl: './department-add.component.html', styleUrls: ['./department-add.component.css'], }) export class DepartmentAddComponent { constructor( private readonly departmentClient: DepartmentClient, public dialogRef: MatDialogRef ) {} cancel() { this.dialogRef.close(); } }
